full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE GTOR 'BUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOM DBUS MDZAD BLO BZANG MKHA' MCHOG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, AER TE NI MIR GEN PAndI TA RGYAL KHANG RTZE HU THUG THU ZHES 'BOD PA, BLO BZANG BDE MCHOG SKYABS DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB KYIS SBYAR BA YI GE PA NI THONG KA LAG PI LIG DU BLO BZANG SBYIN PA 'PHRIN LAS SO, ,'DI KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR BZHIN RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG BDE MCHOG SKYABS DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB,
